sections.body: Enhancement bonuses apply to your armor to increase the armor bonus it provides.
sections.name: Enhancement Bonuses
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Enhancement Bonuses

sections.body: Magical deflection effects ward off attacks and improve your AC.
sections.name: Deflection Bonus
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Deflection Bonus

sections.body: If your race has a tough hide, scales, or thick skin you receive a bonus to your AC.
sections.name: Natural Armor
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Natural Armor

sections.body: Dodge bonuses represent actively avoiding blows. Any situation that denies you your Dexterity bonus also denies you dodge bonuses. (Wearing armor, however, does not limit these bonuses the way it limits a Dexterity bonus to AC.) Unlike most sorts of bonuses, dodge bonuses stack with each other.
sections.name: Dodge Bonuses
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Dodge Bonuses

sections.name: Table: Size Modifiers
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Dodge Bonuses/Table Size Modifiers

sections.body: You receive a bonus or penalty to your AC based on your size. See Table: Size Modifiers.
sections.name: Size Modifier
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Armor Class/Other Modifiers/Size Modifier
